name: H4ck3D
description:
H4ck3d is a mindbending VR puzzle-game based on visual scripting.  Make your way as a lone hacker in a stylized virtual world 

H4ck it Old School: Immerse yourself in a stylized VR world based on 1980s' Sci-Fi.

H4ck the World: Change the building blocks of your world with your trusty hacking ware in order to beat the puzzles.

H4ck outside the box: Choose your approach through 9 distinct levels as each puzzle requires you to pay attention to your surroundings and look for creative solutions.

Special Thanks to
João Paulo for Metal Block texture. 

Nihilore for music in trailer.
